Suggested R Packages

Source: vignettes/recs.Rmd
recs.Rmd

vertical currently suggests a limited number of R packages and templates useful for psychological research projects. This suggestion list keeps track of the current suggestions and lists useful alternatives.

R Packages

vertical suggestions

  • pkgdown | compile R package as website
  • devtools | automate aspects of R Package creation while being consistent with R Package standards
  • usethis | automate aspects of R Package creation while being consistent with R Package standards
  • roxygen2 | convenient documentation syntax

Consider also:

  • sinew | automate roxygen comments for function and data documentation

Writing Papers

vertical suggests

  • papaja | write APA papers in R Markdown

Consider also:

  • rticles | numerous R markdown templates for many journal types

Posters

vertical suggests

  • posterdown | write posters in R Markdown

Consider also:

  • pagedown

Slides

vertical suggests

  • slidy | write slide presentations in R Markdown

Consider also:

  • xaringan
  • ioslides
  • beamer

Experiments

vertical suggests

  • jspysch | javascript library for behavioral experiments
  • jspsychr | use RStudio and R markdown/Javascipt to write jspcyh experiments

Consider also:

  • psychtestr
  • xprmntr
  • jaysire

  • Experiments
